**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 344 2.0 **Traditions** [Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4) **Deities** [Apep](/Deities.aspx?ID=631), [Hadregash](/Deities.aspx?ID=503), [Oaur-Ooung](/Deities.aspx?ID=585), [Vorasha](/Deities.aspx?ID=422) **Duration** 1 minute --- You transform into the shape of a legendary monster, assuming a Huge battle form. When you Cast this Spell, choose phoenix, cave worm, or sea serpent. While in this form, you gain the [beast](/Traits.aspx?ID=20) trait (for phoenix) or the [animal](/Traits.aspx?ID=9) trait (for cave worm or sea serpent). You can Dismiss the spell. You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:
  • AC = 20 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 20 temporary Hit Points.
  • [Darkvision](/Rules.aspx?ID=415).
  • One or more [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +28, and you use the listed damage. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the [enfeebled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) condition, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) modifier of +30, unless your own is higher.
You gain specific abilities based on the monster you choose: - **Phoenix** Speed 30 feet, fly 90 feet; **Melee** beak ([reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 2d6+12 piercing plus 2d4 fire and 2d4 [persistent fire](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29); **Melee** talon ([agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 2d8+12 slashing; **Shroud of Flame** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), [primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134)) 20 feet. You gain an aura of fire that extends out from you. A creature that enters or ends its turn within the aura takes 2d6 fire damage. A creature can take this damage only once per turn. You can activate or deactivate this aura with a Sustain action. - **Cave Worm** Speed 40 feet, burrow 30 feet, swim 20 feet; **Melee** jaws ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 2d12+20 piercing; Melee stinger ([agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), Damage 2d8+15 piercing plus 2d6 [persistent poison](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29); Melee body ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)) Damage 2d8+20 bludgeoning; **Inexorable** You automatically recover from the [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [slowed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35), and [stunned](/Conditions.aspx?ID=36) conditions at the end of each of your turns. You're also immune to being [immobilized](/Conditions.aspx?ID=24) and ignore [difficult terrain and greater difficult terrain](/Rules.aspx?ID=453). - **Sea Serpent** Speed 20 feet, swim 90 feet; **Melee** jaws ([reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 2d12+20 piercing; **Melee** tail ([reach 25 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 2d8+20 bludgeoning; **Spine Rake** ([move](/Traits.aspx?ID=114)) You extend your spines and Swim or Stride. Each creature you're adjacent to at any point during your movement takes 4d8+10 slashing damage ([basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=327) Reflex against your spell DC). --- **Heightened (9th)** You instead gain AC = 22 + your level, 25 temporary HP, attack modifier +31, increase damage by one damage die, and Athletics +33.
name: Monstrosity Form
